metadata.title: MOURIV MV-GMC201 2.4G Wireless Lavalier Microphone System Compatible with iPhone 11 X 8 8 Plus 7 6 Smartphone,Canon 6D 600D Nikon D800 D3300 Sony A7 A9 DSLR GoPro Action Cameras
features: MV-GMC201 2.4GHz wireless lavalier Microphone omnidirectional mic system offers perfect solution for crisp audio pick up and recording for video shooting with DSLR camera, camcorder, phone camera etc

Wireless lapel mic system allows to record the audio without cable limitation, supports wireless signal transfer within 15m of distance, perfect for video recording with the demand to move around and from distance;
Omnidirectional audio pick up, designed for vocal or video use, provides clear and accurate voice recording experience to the user, ideal for recording in every situation;

Compact design, lightweight on both transmitter and receiver with the hot shoe and clip for easy installation set up and could be used for interview, video recording, filming wedding video for both professionals and hobbyist;

It can work with Smartphone, Tablet, DSLR camera, Camcorder, Gopro hero 3 3+ 4 Sporting Camera ,Audio recorder, PC and others audio/video devices.[Noted:For iPhone 7 7s ,8 X or Last ,Please use a Lighting to 3.5mm headphone jack adapter for connection(This adapter is not including in the package)
description: The MV-GMC201 is an 2.4Ghz omnidirectional wireless lavalier microphone system that will pick up the main sound from any direction.

The recevier is connected with 3.5mm audio plug which is compatible with most device such as DSLR Cameras from Canon, Nikon, Sony and also working with iOS iPhone, iPad, Android smartphone;Gopro hero 3 3+ 4
Compact design, lightweight body for easy carry around or clip on the belt
Standard camera shoe mount and clip included alone with the carry case
RF Modulation: GFSK (Gauss frequency Shift Keying)
Battery life: Approx. 3.0 hours for both Transmitter and Receiver

MV-GMC201 works with iPhone Samsung Galaxy Phones with audio jack in CTIA Standard. For phones’ audio jack with OMTP Standard please install and use the APP called Cinema FV5, enter the Setting, click the speaker icon, select "Audio Source" and check Extra Mic.
